DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy UCB7665 chronic-intermittent treatment subject generalize myasthenia gravis ( MG ) classify moderate severe .
DOC.brief_title: Study Test Safety , Tolerability Efficacy UCB7665 Subjects With Moderate Severe Myasthenia Gravis .
